org.deeplearning4j.spark.impl.multilayer.evaluation

Class IEvaluateFlatMapFunction<T extends IEvaluation>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.datavec.spark.transform.BaseFlatMapFunctionAdaptee<java.util.Iterator<DataSet>,T[]>
      • org.deeplearning4j.spark.impl.multilayer.evaluation.IEvaluateFlatMapFunction<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.apache.spark.api.java.function.FlatMapFunction<java.util.Iterator<DataSet>,T[]>

    public class IEvaluateFlatMapFunction<T extends IEvaluation>
extends BaseFlatMapFunctionAdaptee<java.util.Iterator<DataSet>,T[]>
    Function to evaluate data (using an IEvaluation instance), in a distributed manner Flat map function used to batch examples for computational efficiency + reduce number of IEvaluation objects returned for network efficiency.
    See Also:
